attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a free country, we should have the decision to choose what we want to buy and not be forced to pay for services we do not wish to receive. This is clearly a surreptitious tax and does not promote a fair and free market for other broadcasters.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence:  http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/tvlicencereview/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
